synopsis.text: Hakushon Daimaou, a somewhat clumsy and chaotic genie, has been slumbering in a mysterious bottle for eons. When curious young Kan-chan stumbles upon the bottle in his dusty attic, a simple sneeze unleashes the magical being. Now, the genie must fulfill every wish of the one who released him until they sneeze again. However, with Hakushon Daimaou's penchant for mishaps, the well-intentioned wishes often lead to unexpected and hilarious consequences. Prepare for a rollercoaster ride of magical mayhem as the young boy and his newfound genie friend navigate the complexities of wish-granting in this enchanting anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
